resources.string: Compressions: Restore blood circulation\nAirway: Open the airway\nBreathing: Breathe for the person
Cool the entire body by sponging or spraying cold water, and fan the person to help lower the body temperature.

Stand behind the person.
Make a fist with one hand.
Grasp the fist with the other hand.
Perform between six and 10 abdominal thrusts
cool the burn with cool or lukewarm running water for 20 minutes\nremove any clothing or jewellery that\'s near the burnt area of skin\nmake sure the person keeps warm
the pills are in the left pocket of my coat
